present-tense.name: Present Tense
data: 1st Conjugation: Drop "re" of 2nd part/infinitive ➡ Add personal ending (1st singular ending is "o" not "ao")
2nd Conjugation: Drop "re" of 2nd part/infinitive ➡ Add personal ending
3rd Conjugation: Drop "o" of 1st principal part ➡ Add "o", "is", "it", "imus", "itis", "unt"
3rd-io Conjugation: Drop "o" of 1st principal part ➡ Add (include a "u" if 3rd plural) personal ending
4th Conjugation: Drop "o" of 1st principal part ➡ Add (include a "u" if 3rd plural) personal ending

imperfect-tense.name: Imperfect Tense
data: 1st Conjugation: Drop "re" of 2nd part/infinitive ➡ Add "ba" + personal ending
2nd Conjugation: Drop "re" of 2nd part/infinitive ➡ Add "ba" + personal ending
3rd Conjugation: Drop "o" of 1st principal part ➡ Add "eba" + personal ending
3rd-io Conjugation: Drop "o" of 1st principal part ➡ Add "eba" + personal ending
4th Conjugation: Drop "o" of 1st principal part ➡ Add "eba" + personal ending

identify-verb-conjugations.name: Identify Verb Conjugations
data: 1st Conjugation: o, are [Ex: amo, amare]
2nd Conjugation: eo, ere [Ex: sedeo, sedere]
3rd Conjugation: o, ere [Ex: duco, ducere]
3rd-io Conjugation: io, ere [Ex: capio, capere]
4th Conjugation: io, ire [Ex: audio, audire]

declension-functions.name: Declension Functions
data: The/a ____ (subject)
Of the/a ____ (possession)
To/for the/a ____ (indirect object)
The/a ____ (direct object)
By/with/from/in the/a ____
